Item.Name: 6910 EMERALD & BLACK strapped corset 36
Item.Description: A beautiful new color for corsets! Jacquard weave emerald green satin with smooth black satin inserts flowing up the body from the thighs to the breasts and over the shoulders. Between the strap supports, the bones and the lacing up the back, your figure will look its best! Eleven spiral steel bones in the corset encourage good posture, adding inches to your height while the lacing subtracts inches from your waistline. The lacing is bi-directional. That means it laces from the bottom to the center and from the top to the center, putting the majority of the torque at the waist where you want it. Do your body and yourself a favor -- look sexy and feel great! Please read the sizing information below carefully. This wonderful corset is a size 36. The sizing refers to the approximate bust measurement. The waist will cinch tightly closed at 28" or open up to as much as 34". The satin panels do not stretch, so the waist is strictly confined between those two measurements. The bust measurement is a little more flexible, depending on how much bosom swell you want at the top. A 36D is going to look much more voluptuous than a 36B, for instance, but both could look sensational in this corset. Fourteen hook/eye sets fasten up the front. It measures 14" along the center front. There are loops for garters if you want to wear stockings with it. The picture shows matching panties; you are bidding on the corset. New, with manufacturer's tag. Click here to see our other auctions! Our eBay store, ProvocativeLingerie! Item.Description: Here we have a brilliantly shiny and bright barrel link 'baht' style neck chain. This gorgeous chain is 24" long (beads and barrels are 6 mm wide) and weighs in about 30 grams of pure fine platinum with a pure platinum "W Lock" clasp. This is not filled or plated -- it is 100% solid pure fine platinum and is brand new! Pictures do not do this chain justice! It is a custom-designed unique chain. It is all Hand-Made custom jewlery. The chain is very strong. One of the many things that set this apart from any similar chain you might be able to find is that both ends of each hexagon 'barrel' link on this chain have been diamond cut -- this provides added shine and extra appeal. This (as all of my other jewelry for sale on ebay) is completely HAND-MADE -- giving the chain a more flexible and natural feel when you wear it. Most of the mass-produced neck chains have a stiff and rigid feeling when you wear them, mostly due to the links not being individually made(instead, they are cast in a mold -- this makes them much cheaper to make, but an inferior end product for you). Trust me, you will notice the "flowing" feel of this necklace the moment you put it on. This style necklace looks great by itself or with a pendant or charm -- you will definately get looks and compliments on this unique piece of custom jewelry. If you have any questions about this chain oe want additional pictures -- please feel free to contact me at LSIU99@aol.com Shipping on this item will be $15. I accpet Paypal, billpoint, money order.... For more hand-made jewelry, please view my other auctions for a gold and silver version of this style chain -- I also sell pendants, bracelets, and all other types of custom designed jewelry. I design and make most of my jewelry; therefore, you can hardly find the same jewelry in any other places:) Don't Miss it:) Thanks for viewing my auction! - Christine:)

Item.Name: ~GLAM WHITE ANGORA FUR COAT by Dino Ricco~M
Item.Description: ~GLAM WHITE ANGORA FUR COAT by Dino Ricco~M You are bidding on a fabulous white fur coat. The fur is angora rabbit, so it is long and silky-soft. The collar may be worn down, or up to keep you warmer and give a more dramatic look. Long sleeves. The front closes with strong hooks. The jacket is fully-lined in luxurious champagne-colored satin. I don't know very much about fur coats so I am probably leaving out some important details here - please email me with your questions. The seams and workmanship appear to be excellently done, and the jacket is very nice and warm! I can find nothing wrong at all with the jacket, except that there are a couple spots on the lining, right below the label. I think they will come out with cleaning. The tag says, "furrier method dry clean only". Here are the measurements, which I took on the inside because the fur is too fluffy to give an accurate measurement: length = 23", bust = 42", hem (which falls just above or on the hips depending on torso length) = 44". The sleeve from armpit to cuff is 17". Tag says size Medium. Beautiful, and a perfect gift! The close-up picture most accurately shows the color, the top 2 are too dark. Item.Name: Staind Tee Shirt NEW Winterland XL
Item.Description: Staind Tee Shirt NEW Winterland XL Staind Tee XL staind tee palleyd@aol.com presents another exciting auction STAIND "Dysfunction" Tee Shirt by Giant Size Adult XLarge Brand New, Never Worn Style: Basic Black Tee This is the Front of the Shirt This is a Genuine Licensed Giant Tee shirt, they make the highest quality clothing for the the Music Industry. This is the back of the shirt Regular retail on this High quality 100% Heavy Cotton Tee is $24.99. There is no reserve. Guaranteed Delivery for Christmas Shipping for this Tee Shirt is $3 by First Class Mail in the USA. Add only $2 shipping for each Additional tee shirt that you win and have shipped at the same time. For Canada, only $5 postage insured by Airmail. Other International orders please email for postage cost. Check out all of our Auctions today, CLICK Visit our website at www.palleyd.com for more information Frequently asked Questions: (1) How long until I receive my auction win? -----After you pay, If you choose Ground Service it takes from 7-10 days to reach the East Coast from us in California. Air is 2-3 days, If you are in Canada, we now ship via USPS. Other International customers please allow 2-4 weeks. International shipments are by US mail only. (2) Can I mail payment? ---- Yes, I will notify all winners by email within 24 hours of auction end with a mailing address for payments. Payment must be in US Funds. Domestic Checks are not held, unless you have a Zero rating. Add 8% Calif sales tax to the merchandise portion if you are in California. We ship as soon as we receive your payment, Please put the auction number, your Ebay name, and your shipping address in the envelope. Allow 7 days extra if you mail payment. We can't leave feedback if you forget your Ebay name (email address). International mail payments must be US$ Money Orders. (3) How about Paypal or Billpoint? --- We love Paypal.com and Billpoint.com, please follow the above instructions, we need the same information as if you mailed payment. Paypal is processed once a day. Pay to palleyd@aol.com. Use Paypal, Bidpay.com or billpoint.com if you are an International customer. (4) Can I pay at a secure website with a credit card? ---- Please use Paypal.com. (5) Can I call in with a credit card? --- We are accepting credit cards through Paypal or Billpoint to pay with a credit card, that is the guaranteed safest way. You may also call me direct with the credit card number over the phone at 818-481-3042. Leave the cc# & exp date on Voice Mail, and your name. Email separately your shipping address and auction #. (6) Can I combine auctions and save on the shipping? ---- Yes. When you are ready to pay for all of the auctions, email us at palleyd@aol.com with a list of all of the auction numbers that you want to have shipped together, and your name and shipping address, and we will email you back with the combined reduced shipping charge. Some items, such as Bubble Lights and Desks are too large to combine. In general, there is a minimum charge of at least $1-$2 per extra auction combined for shipping and handling. (7) Can I email you with a question? --- Yes, but we are getting so many emails that it sometimes takes 2 days or more to answer, especially on weekends and Holidays. We are training more employees on how to answer email, but it is a long process. Before leaving negative feedback because of slow email response, give it an extra day or two. (8) Is my purchase guaranteed? --- Yes, we have a 30 day unconditional guarantee. If your item is defective or different from the description in the auction, we will refund your money. Even if you are simply unhappy with the item, you may return it for a refund, but in that case we don't pay for shipping. You must return the item, and we will reimburse you for shipping. We are not responsible for carrier delays in delivery. (9) Special Note on International Orders. --- Our online system does not calculate shipping for International auction orders, we do that manually when we process your order. For a quote on shipping, please email us with your address and the auction number, and we will email back with a quote. When you process your auction online at Paypal or Billpoint, please let us know the amount that we have quoted for postage. Unfortunately, shipping delays are sometimes caused by customs, please be patient, out of thousands of orders that we have sent to Europe and Australia, only a handful have actually been lost. The US Post Office will not allow a claim to be filed for a lost package until 60 days have passed, so please do not request that until after 60 days have passed. We can fax or mail proof of shipment if you send a request for that on a package that has not arrived for thirty days or more. NO RESERVE Buyer to pay $3.00 for shipping and handling. Please click here to see my other auctions. Created by eBay Seller's Assistant Pro

This main unit includes everything needed to get started: a microphone with features, wires for fast and easy television hookup, and a cartridge featuring five songs from Britney Spears, Destiny's Child, Backstreet Boys, and the Beatles. Lyrics will appear on your TV screen while you belt out the tunes! E-kara also includes great features that let you add echoes (sing in the shower or from a mountain top), change tempo, and more. Why bid by Proxy? Because It Means You Don't Have To Monitor The Auction As It Unfolds. Item.Name: BIG BROTHER~ The Game ~Pressman NEW/SEALED
Item.Description: BIG BROTHER ~ The Game ~ By Pressman WHO GETS KICKED OUT? WHO GETS TO STAY? Just like the TV show players get to know each other AND you get to know yourself. Good qualities are rewarded; personality flaws are definitely not! Who wouldn_t think of sneaking a peek at someone else_s diary? Who loves to talk about everyone_s else_s mistakes? Who can step in at a moment_s notice and take care of a problem? Who_s the biggest cheapskate at the table? Try to get the most votes for the good qualities _ hope that you don_t get them when the nasty stuff comes up. You_ll never play the same Big Brother game twice! Hundreds of different _confrontations_ make it a different experience every time! And camera cards may catch any player doing something best not done in public! 5 SIGNS THAT YOU_RE READY TO PLAY: You can handle it when your friends tell you what they think. You certainly don_t mind telling your friends what you think. You can take the bad news with the good. You can give the bad news with the good. ~ AND ~ You can remember_..it_s a game! For 4 to 6 Adult Players ages 16 and up. Game manufactured in 2000 by Pressman Toy Corporation This game is BRAND NEW & FACTORY SEALED. Terms: I accept MasterCard and Visa through PayPal. Money orders are preferred over checks but checks will be accepted-- but please understand that shipment of your auction could be delayed until the check has cleared. I request that payment be made within 10 days of the conclusion of this auction. If that is not possible, email me as soon as possible to prevent your item from being relisted. All of my items come from a nonsmoking home. Manufacturer_s warranty only.

Item.Name: HOT WHEELS LEGENDS Jay Leno 4 car set VHTF!!!
Item.Description: This auction is for 4 brand new, never removed from the box or displayed, Jay Leno Hot Wheels Legends 4 car set. These are VERY HARD TO FIND CARS!! What great cars to add to your collection. In recognition of Leno's love of cars, Mattel has created the Hot Wheels Legends Jay Leno Collection. The four die-cast cars selected for the series all represent vehicles that set a standard for cutting edge technology and eye-catching design, which is why they appealed to Leno in the first place. Cars featured in this auction are: Lamborghini Miura ~ This car was the original mid-engine Italian exotic car that combined trend-setting styling with high-performance technology and helped establish the reputation of Lamborghini, Jaguar XKE ~ Leno usually doesn't customize cars, but his Jaguar is an exception. The front end is from a 1972 XKE, while the rear portion is from a 1963 XKE. Shelby-Cobra Replica ~ Leno has always coveted the legendary 427 Shelby Cobra, but knowing that tracking down just the right example of this limited production car can be nearly impossible, he created his own version of this classic. Leno's version of this classic differs slightly from the stock version-it's powered by a 427 single overhead cam, which was used successfully in powerboat racing. Shelby Mustang GT350 ~ Leno has always been a big fan of Ford cars, so when a Ford-powered Cobra beat Ferrari at Le Mans, it was like a Super Bowl victory for Leno. This Shelby Mustang features the same engine. Are you starting your Christmas shopping early? These would make great gifts!! Winning bidder to pay $3.95 shipping (insurance optional). I accept money orders and visa/mastercard through Paypal. NO PERSONAL CHECKS AND NO INTERNATIONAL OR CANADA BIDDERS, PLEASE. Item.Name: NWOT Summer Suit for Baby Girl
Item.Description: This auction is for two outfits. Please note the following information. The first outfit is New Without the tags. I thought I would wear this on our September baby one day and then changed my mind thinking it wasn't worth wearing a new outfit and being cold all day. So, she never did get to wear it. It is a two piece set by Tiny Tots. Very soft. It has green, purple and white stripes. On the chest (on a white background) is a heart embroidered with the word, "Love" in the center. There are two bows on either side of the tummy. It has shorts that match. The second outfit is by Little Miracles. The bad news first...the top snap at the back of the neck is broken. All of the pieces are there, but the snap has come apart (if you've ever dealt with baby clothes, you know just what I'm talking about). If you're ingenius, I'm not, you would be able to fix it. The other way to get around is to not use the top snap. Anyway it's a very soft white two piece outfit with a little sleeveless top and matching romper pants. There are blue and pink flowers embroidered on the chest and a little satin bow attached. Really a sweet outfit. Too bad about the snap. Both outfits are size 3 - 6 months. Item.Name: 8 OZ ROSEWATER & GLYCERIN LOTION + ROSE SOAP
Item.Description: 8 OZ ROSEWATER & GLYCERIN LOTION + ROSE SOAP - Remember the sweet-smelling rosewater and glycerin hand lotion your grandmother used? Well, it is just as fragrant today as it was a century ago. Problem is, it can cost 25 to 40 dollars for a small tube or jar. So when I finally found a supplier with a reasonable price tag, I stocked up to get the biggest discount possible. Now I can share the savings. The starting bid is just $8.00 for 8 ounces (not four). And I will include TWO bars of soap made with genuine rose essence as a little bonus. My auction list also contains a rosewater and glycerine spray for the skin, hair and linens. Win both and save on shipping. These items are new and unused and make a great gift for the "lady who has everything"... There's nothing like the scent of roses.
